text: The Harder They Fall is a 1956 American crime drama movie directed by Mark Robson and was based on the 1947 novel by Budd Schulberg. It stars Humphrey Bogart, Rod Steiger, Jan Sterling, Mike Lane, Edward Andrews, Jack Albertson, Nehemiah Persoff, Harold J. Stone and was distributed by Columbia Pictures. It was nominated for an Academy Award in 1957. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1956 crime drama movies Category:American crime drama movies Category:Movies directed by Mark Robson Category:Movies based on books Category:Columbia Pictures movies
title: The Harder They Fall
